name: Boris Brejcha
description: '''Boris Brejcha''' ({{IPA|de|'borɪs ˈbrɛjʃaː}}; born November 26, 1981, in [[Ludwigshafen am Rhein]]) is a German [[DJ]] and [[record producer]]. He describes his music style as "''high-tech [[minimal techno|minimal]]''." His style has been compared with [[DJ Umek]], and [[Solomun (musician)|Solomun]]. Brejcha frequently wears a joker mask based on a [[Carnival of Venice]] design. He has performed at clubs and festivals around the world, including [[Tomorrowland (festival)|Tomorrowland]] and [[Coachella (festival)|Coachella]]. Boris founded the label ''Fckng Serious'' in 2015 with Ann Clue and Deniz Bul. He performed for the first time in Ibiza in August 2019, at [[Space (Ibiza nightclub)|Hï Ibiza club]]. On 24 January 2020, Brejcha released his sixth album ''Space Diver'' as his first album for [[Ultra Records]]. In 2021, Brejcha was 42nd on [[DJ Mag]]s ''Top 100 DJs''.
